Where to Stay

Last but not least, any suggestions of decent hotels/accomodation would be extremely helpful! We are particularly looking for someplace
*** Mandarin Oriental - This hotel is in the city centre and located next to KLCC, Petronas Towers, the Light Rail Transit (LRT) and enables you to get everywhere easily. The hotel has wifi and excellent meeting rooms.
*** The Westin Kuala Lumpur - This hotel is in the heart of Kuala Lumpur and is easily accessible
*** J.W Marriot Kuala Lumpur - This hotel is in the heart of Kuala Lumpur and is easily accessible
